description:
http://anidb.net/ch1468 [Excel] is a hyper-enthusiastic girl employed by the super-secret organization http://anidb.net/ch7556 [Across] with the aim to take over the world. And she will do anything for her beloved http://anidb.net/ch13839 [Ilpalazzo], the leader of Across. In this endeavour she is joined by the constantly near-death-skimming http://anidb.net/ch7795 [Hyatt], the next-door neighbour boys, http://anidb.net/ch7357 [Nabeshin] the director, http://anidb.net/ch13838 [Menchi] the puppy, http://anidb.net/ch5010 [Pedro] the immigrant worker and the Grand Will of the Macrocosm!
Note: http://anidb.net/e1903 [Episode 26] was never shown on Japanese TV, it was added as a DVD bonus instead.

REGULAR.description:
Excel works toward Il Palazzo’s newest goal: the elimination of all comic book artists! In the course of her mission, she dies a few times and rescues a dog that she might eat for dinner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Plan para asesinar a Koshi Rikudo

REGULAR.description:
When an adorable alien invasion force appears in the skies above F City, Excel springs into action! During the chaos, Nabeshin and Space Butler work together for the good of a sleeping princess.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La femme qui vient de Mars

REGULAR.description:
Deep in the jungle, Excel is held captive by a small army of soldiers.  Il Palazzo sends Hyatt to deal with the situation - and she fails completely. But the guerillas have a bigger problem: Nabeshin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El chivo expiatorio de la gran huida hostil del infierno
Jigoku no Dokudoku Daidassou no Ikenie
L`agneau sacrificiel de la grande évasion venimeuse de l`Enfer
The Sacrificial Lamb of the Venomous Great Escape of Hell
地獄の毒々大脱走のいけにえ

REGULAR.description:
Watanabe wants to get romantic with Hyatt, but he might not have the moves to make it happen - especially when it turns out his moves are actually being controlled by controlled by Il Palazzo!
Source: crunchyroll

City Hall is in the manipulative clutches of a secret mastermind. Can Excel and Hyatt defeat the dangerous deviant and untangle the web of political corruption? Meanwhile, zombie attack!
Source: crunchyroll

Wandering within a snowy mountain range, the gang struggles to survive! As Excel and Hyatt hunt for food, Iwata, Watanabe, and Sumiyoshi familiarize themselves with some high-powered laser guns.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: El frio es invierno! Un episodio cubierto de nieve
Samu ga Fuyui ze!! Sounan Hen
The Cold Is Winter! Snowed Under Episode

REGULAR.description:
Horror lurks in the slimy tunnels beneath the city! As Excel and the gang navigate the dark corridors, hordes of adorable aliens prepare to pounce. Can their monstrous alien queen be stopped before she gives birth to an army?
Source: crunchyroll

Today’s episode of Excel Saga is a desperate grab for ratings, and you know what that means: A swimming pool full of bouncing babes in barely-there bikinis!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Semana de aumento del índice de audiencia

REGULAR.description:
Excel and Hyatt head to the bowling alley after Il Palazzo suggests using sports as a tool to further his agenda. Unfortunately, the plan might end up in the gutter when terrorists strike. Get it? Gutter? Strike? Bowling!
Source: crunchyroll

After escaping Excel’s hungry clutches, Menchi begins searching for her previous owner. Unfortunately, the little dog goes straight from the frying pan and into the fire when she starts running with a pack of strays.
Source: crunchyroll

Excel’s old high school is overrun by troublemakers and thugs. She and Hyatt quickly straighten the delinquents out, but they might swing and miss on the next mission: turning the school’s pitiful baseball team into winners!
Source: crunchyroll

It’s time for a crime-ridden tale of revenge set on the dirty city streets. Veteran detective Purin’s tough exterior hides a secret, and while the gang works with the gumshoe, Excel has to save Hyatt from a couple of crooks.
Source: crunchyroll

It’s a star-studded New Year’s recap episode featuring a talent competition between Excel and Hyatt. Sit back and enjoy all of your favorite moments from the first twelve installments of Excel Saga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fiesta de año nuevo del fin de año del concurso de talentos ocultos
The New Year`s Year-End Party Hidden Talent Contest
新春年忘れかくし芸大会

REGULAR.description:
The ratings are floundering once again, so it’s time to introduce another new character: Ropponmatsu, a robotic cutie with a knack for defusing bombs. Unfortunately, that’s bad news for Excel - she’s planning to blow up City Hall!
Source: crunchyroll

There’s a new Ropponmatsu on the scene, and while she’s way more annoying than the previous model, she’s just in time to stop Il Palazzo’s newest explosive plot - a plot that involves Excel in a panda costume.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もっと! てこいれメモリアル

REGULAR.description:
It’s hard to keep a good Ropponmatsu down! Both models have returned, and this time they find themselves developing feelings for Excel and Hyatt, thanks to some sketchy programming.
Source: crunchyroll

After Excel and Hyatt arrive in America, their recon mission is derailed by Excel’s not-so-hot grasp of English. And when the girls find themselves tangling with the Mafia, they’re forced to unleash some epic cartoon violence.
Source: crunchyroll

Watanabe’s gang is forced to suit up as a squad of high-tech, masked crime-fighters to keep the streets safe. Unfortunately, city-wide destruction might be inevitable, thanks to the explosive power of their new costumes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daitenjin, les guerriers de la mairie
市立戦隊ダイテンジン

REGULAR.description:
Menchi sails to the United States, where she undertakes an around-the-world adventure with a young heiress. The journey won’t be easy - there’s a deadly assassin on their tail!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La gran aventura de Menchi 2 ~La vuelta al mundo en 80 horas~
Le tour du monde en 80 heures
Menchi`s Great Adventure 2: Around the World in 80 Hours
メンチの大冒険2 ~80時間世界一周~

REGULAR.description:
The time has arrived to reflect on all that Pedro has endured. But this isn’t an ordinary recap show; there’s plenty of new stuff, too, including the reappearance of Nabeshin!
Source: crunchyroll

The big-wigs at ACROSS send a rock n’ roller named Key to give a message to Il Palazzo. Key wants to deliver the information in a song, but first he must find the proper inspiration. Can Excel motivate him to complete his mission?
Source: crunchyroll

After so many missteps, it appears Il Palazzo might finally succeed in conquering the city! There’s only one final obstacle: a war between rival Puchuu factions could destroy the place before ACROSS can take it over.
Source: crunchyroll

A great city is now a wasteland, and the remnants of humanity struggle to survive a rising tide of violence and anarchy. Within the rubble of civilization, there is but one hope for the future. Unfortunately, it’s Excel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La leyenda del conquistador de final de siglo
Legend of the End of the Century Conqueror

REGULAR.description:
Stricken with a case of amnesia in the aftermath of her devastating encounter with Il Palazzo, Excel must fight to remember her forgotten past - and find a way to make her former boss pay for his betrayal.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: きみのためなら死ねる

REGULAR.description:
Koshi Rikdo tells the Excel Saga production team to wrap it up! With the series coming to an end, Watanabe finally makes his move on Hyatt, and Excel prepares for her climactic confrontation with Il Palazzo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: We Will Not Be Held Responsible

SPECIAL.description:
Prepare to witness the most over-the-top insanity ever. This very special episode of Excel Saga doesn’t cross the line of decency. No, this episode gleefully stomps the line of decency into a disgusting, oozing pulp!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omake Heppoko Oouso CM: Action Eiga Hen
おまけ へっぽこ大嘘CM -アクション映画編-
Omake Heppoko Oouso Yokokuhen: Jun`ai Version
おまけ へっぽこ大嘘予告編 -純愛バージョン-
Bonus: Victor & Ours Anime Festival Opening
Omake: Victor & Ours Anime Festival Opening
おまけ VICTOR & OURS アニメフェスティバル オープニング
Omake: OA-ji OP / Kanzenban OP Tettei Hikaku!!
おまけ OA時OP / 完全版OP 徹底比較!!
Omake: Tettei Hikaku Sono 2 OA Tsuujou Version vs. OA Dai 1 Wa Gentei Version
おまけ 徹底比較その2 OA通常バージョン VS OA第1話限定バージョン
Omake: Maruhi OVA Shinsaku Jouhou (Ichibu Oouso)
おまけ (秘)OVA新作情報 (一部大嘘)
Bonus: Puni Puni Poemy Follow-up Report
おまけ ぷにぷに♥ぽえみぃ 続報
Omake: Nabeshin & Kitayama P Daradara to "Poemy" o Kataru Sono 1
おまけ ナベシン&北山P だらだらと「ぽえみぃ」を語る その1
Omake: Hisashiburi no Oouso CM Series "Daitenjin Special" Tokuban Uso Yokoku
おまけ 久しぶりの大嘘CMシリーズ 「ダイテンジンスペシャル」 特番ウソ予告
Bonus: Puni Puni Poemy Behind The Scenes
Omake: Puni Puni Poemy Corner Kobayashi, J.C.Staff o Houmon Suru
おまけ ぷにぷに☆ぽえみぃ コーナー 小林, J.C.STAFFを訪問する
Bonus: Puni Puni Poemy Information Corner
Omake: Puni Puni Poemy Jouhou Corner
おまけ ぷにぷに☆ぽえみぃ 情報コーナー
ぷにぷに☆ぽえみぃ 大どたんば情報
(ITA DVD Bonus 02) Una botola socchiusa ai confini dell`Across
(ITA DVD Bonus 02) Una botola socchiusa ai confini dell`Across
エクセル♥ガールズ CMコレクション
へっぽこ実験アニメーション エクセル・サーガ
Excel Saga: Animación Absurda y Experimental
